required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TCI999 in the Efficacy Verification Program of Hair and Body Health Care
clinical_study.official_title: Lactobacillus Plantarum TCI999 in the Efficacy Verification Program of Hair and Body Health Care

brief_summary.textblock: To assess TCI999 on hair and body health care

primary_outcome.measure: The change of hair loss amount
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline hair loss amount at 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Collected and measured the weight of loss hair

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline hair density at 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Take a picture and observe the hair density

primary_outcome.measure: The change of hair follicle strength
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline hair follicle strength at 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Pull up the hair of the frontal bone, temporal bone and occipital bone (approximately 60 hairs/area) to assess the number of hair loss in each area

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline scalp gloss at 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Chroma Meter MM500 was utilized to measure scalp gloss

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline scalp redness at 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Chroma Meter MM500 was utilized to measure scalp redness

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline scalp health at 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Soft Plus was utilized to measure hair diameter

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline hair diameter at 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Mitutoyo C/N293-100 was utilized to measure hair diameter

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy adults aged above 20 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject who is not willing to participate in this study.
- Patients with diseases of the skin, liver, kidney.
- Subjects who have known cosmetic, drug or food allergies, difficulty in digestive tract absorption or disorder.
- Female who is pregnant or nursing or planning to become pregnant during the course of the study.
- The students taught by the PI.
- Subjects who have wounds on the scalp and subjects who have used drugs to treat the scalp, received hair transplants or other scalp treatments within six months

overall_official.affiliation: Chia Nan University of Pharmacy & Science
